title: Goodnight - Voice, Random, Match, Chat
description:
Find someone special to say Goodnight !
Goodnight app is an incredibly simple, fun and exciting voice-chatting app that you can call and chat with someone close to you for free. Whether you want to meet new people close by, make new friends, learn and practice new languages (like Spanish or English) or find your romance, Goodnight is the app you need on your phone.
Every day every night, 24 hours for free.
Once you connect with someone, you can talk up to 7 minutes.
If you enjoy your match, become friends and send messages again another time.
Awesome features:
• Voice chatting for free with new people around the world.
• Chatting via voice allows you get to know someone much better and can quickly decide if they are are the right match.
• No picture, no text, just voice. Forget about judging or being judged based on pictures. Just listen and talk.
• Add your interests and the languages you speak so your match can be perfect.
Check out our fanpage (https://fb.com/GoodnightApp) and like us to follow our latest news.
---------------------------------------------------------
All packages are auto-renewable subscriptions which mean the subscription will be automatically renewed when it runs out unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
Subscription payment will be charged to the Google Play account at confirmation of purchase.
An account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
---------------------------------------------------------
Permission detail for Goodnight:
* STORAGE / CAMERA :
Using for taking photo or selecting photo from device album.
* MICROPHONE :
Using for voice call, sending voice message and voice intro recording.
* PHONE :
Using for getting phone call status.
* LOCATION :
Using for accessing user's location while matching.

Permission detail for Goodnight:

* STORAGE / CAMERA :
